title: How to Transfer LoL to another drive??
body: I'm running out of space on my C drive so I need to know how to transfer it to another drive.

replies.body: It might be best to uninstall and then do a fresh install if you have to move it to make sure all the game files are still working properly. Copy/pasting or transferring can run the risk of missing or damaged files in the process. Also keep in mind that League is designed to run on the default drive, so it might be better to move other stuff if at all possible!
